title: Functional Values Table
text: The functional values are shown in the table. Note: the values in this table were obtained using a calculator and using all the places given in the calculator output.\n##figure1.gif##

title: The Approaching Limit
text: As we read down the $$\frac{1}{x}$$ columns, does /lim{x,0**-,1/x} and /lim{x,0**+,1/x} approach the same values?

title: Finding $$/lim{x$$ ,0,1/x}
text: Since /lim{x,0**-,1/x}=-inf and /lim{x,0**+,1/x}=+inf have different values, we conclude that $$/lim(x$$ , $$0$$, $$\frac{1}{x}$$ )DNE. The graph of $$f(x)=\frac{1}{x}$$ in the figure confirms these conclusions.\n##figure2.gif##
